law.catch_line: Advisory Committee created -- Members -- Meetings -- Purpose -- Compensation.

text.section: Appointed committee members shall be appointed by the Governor for four (4) year terms. No committee member shall be appointed for more than one (1) successive term.

The committee shall meet at least quarterly or upon request of the department for the purpose of considering matters relating to electrical installations and electrical inspections. The committee shall have the opportunity to review and comment on relevant administrative regulations that are subject to the requirements of KRS 198B.030(8) and (9) and 198B.040(11) and shall make recommendations to and otherwise advise the department on these matters.
All committee members shall be compensated for expenses incurred in the conduct of Commonwealth business.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 7, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 16, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 410, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 5, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 17, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986.
